com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter

Class PlatGameWorldAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.AbstractGameWorldAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.PlatGameWorldAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.IGameWorldAdapter

    public class PlatGameWorldAdapter
extends AbstractGameWorldAdapter
    Class that draws the mode from the gameLogic class: platWorld

      • drawHero

        protected void drawHero()
        Function used to draw the hero. In this mode, when the hero gets hit by an enemy he loses a life and becumes immune to all damage for a few seconds. To show when the hero is immune the hero's sprite is drawn with a a lesser alpha.
        Overrides:
        drawHero in class AbstractGameWorldAdapter
